document.full_text: german-grown beansprouts could be the source of the deadly e.coli outbreak that has killed 22 people, made more than 2,200 ill and led russia to bar eu fruit and vegetable imports, officials said on sunday.
document.title: germany says beansprouts may be behind e.coli
lines_and_colors: german-grown beansprouts could be the source of the deadly e.coli outbreak that has killed 22 people, made more than 2,200 ill and led russia to bar eu fruit and vegetable imports, officials said on sunday.
